COMMANDS_GENERAL_TEST_DESCRIPTION: Check if the bot is working.
COMMANDS_ERROR_NOT_ENOUGH_RIGHTS: Not enough rights to use the command.
COMMANDS_ERROR_SENDER_IS_PIG: Pigs do not have the right to perform this action.
COMMANDS_ERROR_TARGET_IS_NOT_PIG: The user is not a pig.
COMMANDS_ERROR_TARGET_IS_PIG: The user is already a pig.
COMMANDS_ERROR_TARGET_IS_SENDER: You cannot use this command on yourself.
COMMANDS_PIGS_ADD_DESCRIPTION: Add a user to the list of pigs.
COMMANDS_PIGS_ADD_SUCCESS: added to the list of pigs.
COMMANDS_PIGS_ADD_SUCCESS_TARGET_IS_BOT: added to the list of pigs, even though it is a machine.
COMMANDS_PIGS_ADD_FAIL_SENDER_IS_PIG: A pig cannot add other pigs.
COMMANDS_PIGS_ADD_FAIL_TARGET_IS_PIG: The user is already a pig.
COMMANDS_PIGS_ADD_FAIL_TARGET_IS_SENDER: You cannot add yourself to the list of pigs.
COMMANDS_PIGS_ADD_FAIL_TARGET_IS_INVULNE: For such a treacherous act, you are added to the list of pigs.
COMMANDS_PIGS_REMOVE_DESCRIPTION: Remove a user from the list of pigs.
COMMANDS_PIGS_REMOVE_SUCCESS: removed from the list of pigs.
COMMANDS_PIGS_REMOVE_SENDER_IS_PIG: A pig cannot remove other pigs.
COMMANDS_PIGS_REMOVE_TARGET_IS_NOT_PIG: The user is not a pig.
COMMANDS_PIGS_CATEGORIES_ERROR_NOT_EXIST: Category with this name does not exist.
COMMANDS_PIGS_CATEGORIES_ERROR_DEFAULT: This category cannot be changed or deleted
COMMANDS_PIGS_CATEGORIES_CREATE_ERROR_CA: Category with this name already exists.
COMMANDS_PIGS_CATEGORIES_SET_PIG_CATEGOR: Assign a category to a pig.
COMMANDS_PIGS_CATEGORIES_REMOVE_PIG_CATE: Remove a category from a pig
COMMANDS_PIGS_CATEGORIES_ERROR_PIG_HAS_N: Pig does not have this category.
COMMANDS_CONFIGURATION_REACTION_CHANCE_D: Change the chance of a battle reaction
COMMANDS_CONFIGURATION_REACTION_CHANCE_E: The number must be at least 0 and at most 100
COMMANDS_CONFIGURATION_PICTURE_CHANCE_DE: Change the chance of a battle picture
COMMANDS_CONFIGURATION_PICTURE_CHANCE_ER: The number must be at least 0 and at most 100
COMMANDS_PIGS_BATTLE_PICTURE_FAIL_NO_PIC: A picture must be attached to the command
COMMANDS_CONFIGURATION_REACTION_PICTURE_: Change the chance of a battle picture
COMMANDS_CONFIGURATION_REACTION_CHANCE_E: The number must be at least 0 and at most 100
